#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	int a,b,c,d;
	cin>>a>>b;
	while(a||b)
	{d=0;
		c=a+b;
		b=a>b?a:b;
		while(b)
		{
			if(b%10>c%10)
			d++;
			b/=10,c/=10;
		}
		if(!d)
		cout<<"No carry operation.\n";
		else if(d==1)
		cout<<"1 carry operation.\n";
		else cout<<d<<" carry operations.\n";
		cin>>a>>b;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
